subject: RE: [junit] How to test EJBs?
msgSnippet: Your post is kind of vague.  You are asking a big question.  We are just treating EJB like any other classes.  We create the EJB in the set up method and then
messageBody:
Your post is kind of vague. You are asking a big question. We are just
treating EJB like any other classes. We create the EJB in the set up method
and then delete it in the tear down. As long as you have the EJB deployed
to a running app server, your off to the races.

This is really a good topic for discussion. Anyone else what to share there
experiences with EJB testing? I have heard allot about Cactus, How does it
fit in to the whole thing? (Now my post is the vague one <grin>)

John

-----Original Message-----
From: David Thielen [mailto:dthielen@...]
Sent: June 26, 2001 10:29 AM

Subject: RE: [junit] How to test EJBs?


Hi;

Asking again in the hope that someone has a good solution for this.

thanks - dave

Hi;

Is there any good test framework for testing EJBs?

thanks - dave
